speaker: Boy 1
dialog: [Crying] I lost my GI Joe toy in the graveyward and now the ghosts are not returning it back.

speaker: Boy 1
dialog: Could you please help me get back my GI Joe toy from the ghosts?

speaker: Boy 1
dialog: [Happy] Thank you Mr! I've something for you.

dialog: I found these batteries while playing at the park.
